programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick see a young Mermaidman and Barnacleboy in 'Back To The Past', and then there are more classic superhero adventures in 'The Bad Guy Club For Villains'.

programme.desc: Squidward bets SpongeBob that he can't go a day without crying in 'A Day Without Tears', and then in 'Summer Job', Mrs Puff has to work through her summer break at the Krusty Krab.

programme.desc: SpongeBob and Squidward are sent to collect unpaid bills in 'Bubble Bass's Tab', then in 'Kooky Cooks', Spongebob and Squidward cook a fancy meal for Mrs. Puff, but every dish becomes a dispute.

programme.desc: Ronnie Anne tries to get into Luan's pranking academy in 'Dread of the Class', then in 'Welcome to the Doll Heist', Lily accidentally trades Eunice away. (S7, ep 16)

programme.desc: The Bodyguard: When Alvin sees every celebrity with their own personal bodyguard, he decides to train Theodore for the job.

programme.desc: SpongeBob tries to take a shortcut to work, but becomes lost in 'Lost in Bikini Bottom', then in 'Tutor Sauce', after failing his driver's test again, Mr Krabs decides to teach SpongeBob how to drive.

programme.desc: The sisters think Lincoln is bad luck in 'No Such Luck', and in 'Frog Wild', when Lincoln finds out his class is dissecting frogs, he and Lana embark on a mission to rescue them. (S2, ep 8)

programme.desc: Alvin decides to host the coolest paintball party in 'It's My Party', then in 'Keeping up with the Humphries', the boys feel pressure to keep up with their nemesis Bocarter. (S2, ep 16)

programme.desc: Chutes and Splatters: Phoebe's newest mission is to babysit President Kickbutt's troublemaking daughter, but things get out of hand when they sneak into an illegal nightclub. (S3, ep 23)

programme.desc: I'm Gonna Forget You, Sucka: After Cherry posts a photo revealing the Thundermans' secret, the Hero League forces Phoebe to end the relationship with her best friend. (S3, ep 17)

programme.desc: Lincoln needs money for a rare collectible in 'Beg, Borrow and Steele', then in 'There Will Be Mud', the Hunnicutts strike it rich overnight, and move to a fancy wealthy neighbourhood. (S7, ep 19)

programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a live dinosaur in 'A Dinosaur in Dimmadelphia', then in 'Fearless', Hazel wishes that Jasmine was fearless. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Kipo and the Age of Wonderbeasts
programme.desc: To Catch a Deathstalker: Having earned the information she seeks, Kipo leads our heroes to her dad's old burrow. (S2 Ep4)

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: The Trojan Bear: A high-tech metallic bear strangely ends up at Axel's. The multi-function toy quickly wins over our hero and the Power Players - except for Bearbarian, who doesn't trust it. (S1 Ep36)

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: Party On: Zoe takes on the challenge of preparing her enemy Cleo's birthday party. Everything must be perfect! Axel and the Power Players help, but Princess Sugarsalt causes a few problems. (S1 Ep37)

programme.title: Shasha and Milo: Shorts
programme.desc: Minion Life: The Minions struggle to complete a mission for Luca. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Shasha and Milo
programme.desc: Worst In Show: Perennial underdog Bong Bong steps up to be the hero of the hour when a charity 'Animal Talent Show' is gate-crashed by Luca's minions. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.desc: The Case of the Unhappy Camper / The Case of the Triple Inbestigation: When Mr McGillick's phone goes missing at the Grade Five camp, Kyle is accused of hiding it as part of a prank. (S2 Ep10)

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.desc: The Case of the Exciting Excursion / The Case of the Very Lost Notebook: The Grade Five rock climbing excursion is jeopardised when the permission slips go missing. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: The Inbestigators
programme.desc: The Case of the Suspect Sprinkler / The Case of the Peculiar Pop Quiz: The timer on Mrs Maniaci's sprinkler system is tampered with before the 'Garden of the Year' competition. (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Shasha and Milo: Shorts
programme.desc: School Run: Milo getting to school on time no matter what! (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: A Sizeable Problem: When a meteorite falls near the log cabin, strange berries start to grow. One of their properties is that they make those who eat them grow to disproportionate sizes. (S1 Ep27)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Treasure Bear: Under the wood floor of the log cabin, Grizzy and the lemmings discover the entrance to an underground gallery. (S1 Ep28)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: In the Service of His Majesty: When Grizzy brandishes an Indian sceptre that the lemmings brought home, the lemmings bow low before him and behave like servants. (S1 Ep29)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Art: Grizzy tries to impress the she-bear by making a sculpture of her from a piece of wood. But as soon as the artist's back is turned, the lemmings gnaw at the work of art. (S1 Ep30)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Cone-versation: Noah is forced to wear a cone of shame and feels left out of everything. But when he learns of pirate treasure buried under the school, he becomes leader of the quest. (S3 Ep45)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Oozing Talent: When Sugar unwittingly wins a job as spokesperson for a diarrhoea medication, she enlists the help of her friends to stop the commercial from premiering during the big game. (S3 Ep46)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Senior Sinisters: Harold concocts an anti-age cream for Chef, but when it turns the kids old Chef decides to hide the reversal cream - taking care of old people is making him young again! (S3 Ep47)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Be Claws I Love You, Shelley: When Owen brings a lobster in for show and tell, we discover that Chef has a real lobster problem. (S3 Ep48)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Total Trauma Rama: Duncan, normally the bad kid, has an identity crisis when his pranks start curing people of their fears. (S3 Ep49)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Doomed Ballooned Marooned: After over-decorating a birthday table with balloons, several kids float away to a deserted island. (S3 Ep50)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Legends of the Paul: Duncan is jealous of Paul's 100-year time out and, determined to be King of the Pranks, has to team up with Paul, learn his ways and double-cross him to become a legend. (S3 Ep51)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Bridgette Too Far: As season three draws to a close, Bridgette becomes desperate to star in an episode. (S3 Ep52)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Arakno Race: The Tikis have been sabotaged! Team Pirate is blamed and black-listed, with Mouse as sole ally...Until Corto discovers the actual culprits. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: The Bubbler: Armed with a magic bubble sword, Nino becomes the Bubbler. He wants to rid Paris of all the parents, because they can be such spoilsports! (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Simon Says: Humiliated in a TV talent contest where he performed a hypnotist act, Simon is akumatized and turned into Simon Says. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: Rogue Beasticon: Since breaking away from the Crimson Lord, Xinyan hates humans. When he gets a Shard that brings out people's animal nature, he wants to make a Human Zoo. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: Practice Makes Perfect: The Mermicornos try to level up their powers in a magical training shell, but Astra's obsession with perfection puts them all in danger. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Not for the Paint of Heart: When Izzy believes that Chef wants her to "Rise to the Challenge" of destroying the daycare with art, she gets some magic paint to bring her creations to life. (S3 Ep33)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Daycare of Rock: After believing he's turned Chef to stone Duncan sets his sights on ultimate chaos only to discover there's no joy in victory without an adversary. (S3 Ep34)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Tree Stooges Save Christmas - Part 1: The kids accidentally destroy Chef's decorated Christmas tree. So they go on an epic mission to replace his holiday treasures. (S3 Ep35)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Tree Stooges Save Christmas PT2: The kids accidentally destroy Chef's decorated Christmas tree. So they go on an epic mission to replace his holiday treasures. (S3 Ep36)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Aches & Ladders: When MacArthur has a bad fall in the school, the kids' recollections of the event are just as weird as they are. (S3 Ep37)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Cactus Makes Perfect: Cody's friends become concerned when he forms a new friendship with a cactus. (S3 Ep38)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Rock 'N' Rolla Coaster Race: Unsettled by the Tao Twin's skills - and by their charming captain, Corto tries to boost Maroro with an ancient Aqua relic... (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Penalteam: When one of Shadow Moth's favorite victims is akumatized into Penalteam, a fearsome team of supervillains, Ladybug calls on her own superheroes to face her. (S4 Ep24)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Risk (Shadow Moth's Final Attack - Part 1): Without Ladybug and Cat Noir knowing, Shadow Moth patiently sets his final attack in motion... (S4 Ep25)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: Gravity: A Shard in Gram-Gram's dice is the centre of gravity. When the dice roll, so does the city! The stakes of a Mahjong game couldn't be higher. (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: Puppets: L.J. feels like a puppet, pulled between teen and Jade life. When a Shard in a singing bowl makes people mindless vessels, the Crimson Lord gets a puppet army. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Style Queen: Chloe's mother gets akumatized into Style Queen. Armed with a sceptre and determined to get revenge, she attacks Adrien. (S2 Ep18)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of...
programme.desc: ...Ladybug & Cat Noir: Queen Wasp: Chloe gets akumatized into Queen Wasp. Will Ladybug and Cat Noir manage to stop this superhero turned supervillain? (S2 Ep19)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: Breaking News!: When the Goha Gazette slams Rush Duels, will this new way to duel become yesterday's news? (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Us 'r' Toys: Chef brings in some old toys from his childhood and he, Duncan and Gwen get magically sucked into the toys and need to find a way to get back into their own bodies. (S2 Ep21)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dream Worriers: Izzy forgets the ending to her most amazing dream of all time, so the kids travel into her mind to find out what happened. (S2 Ep22)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Grody To The Maximum: Cody gets a super cool new t-shirt. It's so cool that the kids don't even recognise him, so Cody jumps on the chance to leave his old life behind and become popular. (S2 Ep23)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Wiggin' Out: Bridgette donates her hair to a charity that makes wigs for hairless cats and now some classmates want to do the same. (S2 Ep24)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Upside Of Hunger: Owen has a mishap while baking an upside-down cake and is transported to an upside-down world where he is forced to outwit himself in order to get his cake back. (S2 Ep25)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Fire In The Hole: Duncan cooks up a nuclear hot sauce to mess with Chef, but accidentally summons Terry Spice, King of the Underworld! (S2 Ep26)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Tu Ba Or Not Tu Ba: The class tries to help Chef achieve his dream of joining the world's most famous Tuba Band, Tubalicious, only to regret it when they realise how much they'll miss him. (S2 Ep27)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dude Where's Macaw: While trying to defend his elite gamer status, Chef uses an old cheat code that brings a dangerous avatar to life. (S2 Ep28)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: Rushing for Ramen: A duelling foodie challenges Yuga to a Rush Duel for the last bowl of his favourite ramen. (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.desc: Warning From Jaco! Freeza and His 1,000 Soldiers Are Drawing Near!: Frieza plans his revenge against Goku and Earth, but when he learns how strong Goku has become, he begins training. (S1 Ep20)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Sugar & Spice & Lightning & Frights: Two new kids show up at the daycare. Duncan and Leshawna take issue with not what makes them different, but what makes them similar to the newbies. (S3 Ep8)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Breaking Bite: Beth becomes the big dog on campus after she bites Duncan, but being the big dog is a dangerous thing, especially when you didn't actually bite anybody! (S3 Ep9)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: I Dream of Meanie: When Cody keeps screaming in his sleep, Gwen and Duncan take a trip into Cody's dreams to see what is scaring him. (S3 Ep10)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Squirrels Squirrels Squirrels: Courtney's attempt to make Chef a better teacher fails when a squirrel gets his hands on her mind-control device. (S3 Ep11)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Say Hello to My Little Friends: After telling the kids he will not miss them over the long weekend, Chef locks himself into the school and finds out he was very, very wrong. (S3 Ep12)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: WaterHose-Five: It's the hottest day of the year and a broken air conditioner leads to a water battle of epic proportions to determine who controls the garden hose. (S3 Ep13)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Cody the Barbarian: Cody is set to inherit a video game empire from his long lost uncle, but only if he and his friends have what it takes to conquer a fantastical live action video game. (S3 Ep14)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: TP2: Judgement Bidet: When the city experiences a toilet paper shortage, Beth and Harold investigate and discover it's their old rival Sewer Mike who is the mastermind behind it all. (S3 Ep15)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Beth And The Beanstalk: After having a chocolate bar confiscated by Chef, Beth finds herself in a parallel giant world and aims to get back her now giant chocolate bar. (S2 Ep11)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The A-bok-bok-bokalypse: When chicken pox sweeps through the school, the kids visit the Chicken Queen to apologise for past misdeeds and hopefully procure an antidote before it's too late! (S2 Ep12)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Pinata Regatta: Izzy can't bring herself to smash a pinata during Cinco de Mayo celebrations. But when that unsmashed pinata comes to life and spawns an evil pinata army, it's batter up. (S2 Ep13)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Dame-gerous Game: After Leshawna, Bridgette, Owen and Cody win a hide and seek contest, they're trapped on a private island by a jealous ex-champion and forced to play for their freedom. (S2 Ep14)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Royal Flush: When the other kids fear Harold has accidentally flushed himself down Chef's fancy new toilet, they travel into the sewer on a rescue mission. (S2 Ep15)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Final Race Part 1: The Tikis qualify for the grand finale against the Tao Twins and Team Mirage on the Titan Crab racecourse. (S1 Ep25)

programme.desc: The Final Race Part 2: Corto unknowingly awakens the Titan Crab after following Kasskrane's shortcut. (S1 Ep26)

programme.desc: Snow Lemmings: Grizzy craves ice cream on a hot day, but the Lemmings have used strawberry-vanilla ice cream to create a sled run in the backyard. (S1 Ep63)

programme.title: Joni Jet

programme.title: Timpo

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd

programme.title: Abadas

programme.title: Pablo

programme.title: Cymylaubychain

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Daniel wedi syrffedu ar fod yng nghysgod y Jet-lu, ac yn penderfynu dod yn arwr hefyd. Daniel Jones is fed up with being in the shadow of the Jet-lu. He decides to become a hero too.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd

programme.title: New: Stwnsh Sadwrn Byw

programme.title: Annibendod

programme.title: Gwyliau Gartref
programme.desc: Pentref bywiog Betws-y-Coed yng nghalon Eryri yw'r lleoliad tro ma. Pa garfan fydd yn ennill? Two crews with two different budgets, but who will have the most fun? This time: Betws-y-Coed. [SL]

programme.title: Ffasiwn Drefn
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, cwpwrdd dillad Dafydd Lennon o Gaerdydd sy'n cael ei drawsnewid. This week, the team will be decluttering and transforming Dafydd Lennon's wardrobe at his home in Cardiff. [SL]

programme.title: Ceffylau, Sheikhs a Chowbois

programme.title: Arfordir Cymru: Sir Benfro
programme.desc: Bydd Bedwyr yn teithio o Drefdraeth i Abergwaun gan gyfarfod cerflunydd sy'n cael ei ysbrydoli gan enwau'r arfordir. Bedwyr learns about the Pembrokeshire dialect as he travels to Fishguard. [SL]

programme.title: Ffermio
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn am faterion cefn gwlad. Weekly countryside and farming magazine. [SL]

programme.title: Sgwrs Dan y Lloer

programme.title: Busnes Bwyd

programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen olaf, mae Iolo yn edrych ar effaith cynhesu byd-eang ar fywyd gwyllt. In the final episode, Iolo looks at the effects of global warming on wildlife. [SL]

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae Meinir wrth ei bodd yn croesawu Sioned ag Adam i Bant y Wennol. Adam advises Meinir on using vegetables in an ornamental border, and Sioned creates an interesting display using mint. [SL]

programme.title: Y Ci Perffaith
programme.desc: Y tro ma, mae'r teulu Evans yn cael cwmni dau gi - un bach ac un mwy mewn maint. Ond pa un fydd eu Ci Perffaith? Today, the Evans family are joined by two dogs, one small and one larger.

programme.title: Sgwrs dan y Lloer: Noel Thomas

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: Y Busnes Bwyd

programme.title: Cofio Llewod '71
programme.desc: Ailddarllediad yn dilyn marwolaeth diweddar Barry John. Arwyr rygbi Cymru sy'n cofio nl 50ml ers i'r Llewod ennill cyfres yn Seland Newydd. Special repeat following Barry John's death.

programme.title: Aur y Noson Lawen
programme.desc: Tro hyn bydd y clipiau yn amlygu rl y teulu yn ein bywydau ac yn olrhain cyfraniad dau deulu talentog i'r rhaglen. A look at the archives of one of Wales' best-loved TV shows.

programme.title: Arctig Gwyllt Iolo Williams

programme.title: Richard Holt: Yr Academi Felys

programme.title: Assignment Redhead

programme.title: The Devil's Disciple
programme.desc: 1959. Drama. Directed by Guy Hamilton. Stars Burt Lancaster, Kirk Douglas & Laurence Olivier. A case of mistaken identity leads an outcast and a local minister to discover their true vocations. [S]

programme.title: The Trouble with Angels
programme.desc: 1966. Comedy. Directed by Ida Lupino. Stars Rosalind Russell, Hayley Mills & Binnie Barnes. A pair of young troublemakers are assigned to a convent school and keep the Reverend Mother on her toes. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Laying the Table
programme.desc: 1967. A fascinating look at the changing shape of the table, with different designs in pottery, glass and cutlery.

programme.title: Dangerous Voyage
programme.desc: 1954. Crime. Director: Vernon Sewell. Stars William Lundigan, Naomi Chance & Vincent Ball. This 1954 crime mystery is an intriguing tale of peril in the English Channel. [S]

programme.title: Lord Jim
programme.desc: 1965. Adventure. Directed by Richard Brooks. Stars James Mason, Peter O'Toole & Curt Jurgens. A discredited seaman, desperately seeking to redeem himself, agrees to deliver a dangerous shipment. [S]

programme.title: The League of Gentlemen
programme.desc: 1960. Crime Drama. Director: Basil Dearden. Stars Jack Hawkins, Richard Attenborough, Nigel Patrick & Roger Livesey. Ex-army men are recruited for a bank robbery that requires military precision. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Members Only
programme.desc: 1962. This film takes a visit to London's clubland, from the smoky rooms of Soho to the traditional clubs in St James.

programme.title: Strange But True
programme.desc: Chingle Hall/Psychic Detective: Part 1. 1996. Michael Aspel explores the ghostly presence at the 700 year old manor house Chingle Hall and the baffling story of American psychic Dixie Yetarian. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro is down in the Cellar Club with more intriguing and creepy treats. First, is Hair Trigger, another captivating episode from the 70s series Doomwatch. [S]

programme.title: Doomwatch
programme.desc: Hair Trigger. 1972. Stars John Paul, John Barron & Barry Jackson. A radical practice in a mental home comes under Doomwatch investigation where they discover the patients are being lobotomised. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro continues this dark night with a ghostly tale, as next up is the 1972 sci-fi horror The Stone Tape, written by Nigel Kneale and originally broadcast as a Christmas ghost story. [S]

programme.title: The Stone Tape
programme.desc: 1972. Sci-fi/Horror. Directed by Peter Sasdy. Stars Michael Bryant, Jane Asher & Ian Cuthbertson. A team of scientists working in an abandoned mansion encounter a malevolent force. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: As Caroline Munro closes up the Cellar Club for the evening, she takes a look at what's to come. [S]

programme.title: A Prayer for the Dying
programme.desc: 1987. Crime. Directed by Mike Hodges. Stars Mickey Rourke, Bob Hoskins & Alan Bates. An IRA hitman wants out, but the price for his freedom is one last job and it won't be as easy as he thinks. [S]

programme.title: A Prayer for the Dying
programme.desc: 1987. Crime. Directed by Mike Hodges. Stars Mickey Rourke, Bob Hoskins & Alan Bates. An IRA hitman wants out, but the price for his freedom is one last job and it won't be as easy as he thinks. [S]

programme.title: The Big Boodle
programme.desc: 1957. Crime. Directed by Richard Wilson. Stars Errol Flynn, Pedro Armendriz & Rossana Rory. Cuban crooks and police chase a casino card dealer who is falsely accused of counterfeiting pesos. [S]

programme.title: The Ace of Spades
programme.desc: 1935. Crime drama made at Twickenham Film Studios. Starring Michael Hogan, Dorothy Boyd and Richard Cooper. A man is accused of murder based on evidence written on a playing card. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Channel Tunnel
programme.desc: 1962. A look into the trial tunnel and a look at all the scientific research necessary.

programme.title: Time To Remember
programme.desc: Round the Clock. 1964. Narrated by William Bendix. A focus on events from 1943 to 1944, including a look at the American airmen in Britain and their 'round the clock' activities. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Harvest of Hops
programme.desc: 1962. A Look into a typical London family on their annual hop-picking holiday to Kent.

programme.title: The Son of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: 1940. Action. Director: Rowland V. Lee. Louis Hayward, George Sanders, Joan Bennett. Rightful owner of the kingdom, the Duchess of Zona, is engaged in a power struggle with the evil General Gurko. [S]

programme.title: Joey Leads The Way
programme.desc: 1968. Directed by James Richards. An endearing film of the big 'clean up' at spring time in the countryside and how a donkey saves the day. Nice reminder of a 60s childhood in rural England.

programme.title: Space Patrol
programme.desc: Message from a Star. 1963. Stars Libby Morris, Dick Vosburgh & Ronnie Stevens. A special power unit is fitted to the Galasphere, enabling it to travel at faster-than-light speeds. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Joker's Provokers. 1966. Stars Adam West & Cesar Romero. While Batman and Robin attempt to free themselves, The Joker plans to take over Gotham City using a time machine and hallucinogens. [S]

programme.title: Richard the Lionheart
programme.desc: The Norman King. 1962. Stars Dermot Walsh & Elwyn Brook-Jones. Unaware that the King of Sicily and King Philip are plotting his death, Richard accepts their invitation to a banquet in his honour. [S]

programme.title: Supercar
programme.desc: High Tension. 1961. Stars David Graham, George Murcell & Graydon Gould. Masterspy kidnaps Dr. Beaker and contacts the Supercar organisation with a ransom demand. Dr. Beaker for the car. [S]

programme.title: The Last Load
programme.desc: 1948. Family. Directed by John Baxter. Stars Douglas Barr, Ivor Bowyer & Angela Glynne. Two friends help out two sisters who suspect that someone is sabotaging their father's lorry business. [S]

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: The Pharaoh Stones. 1960. Stars Richard Greene & Archie Duncan. A pedlar gives Little John three stones he claims once belonged to the ancient Egyptian kings, causing trouble in the Greenwood. [S]

programme.title: The Lost Continent (1951)
programme.desc: 1951. Sci-fi. Director: Sam Newfield. Stars Cesar Romero, Hillary Brooke & John Hoyt. Major Joe Nolan leads a search for a downed atomic rocket, but the crew crash-land on an island of dinosaurs. [S]

programme.title: One Step Beyond
programme.desc: The Haunted U-Boat. 1959. Stars John Newland, Werner Klemperer & Eric Feldary. During World War II, a German U-boat is apparently haunted by a loud banging which only occurs when it is submerged. [S]

programme.title: Dick Barton: Special Agent
programme.desc: 1979. Writer: Julian Bond. Mr Parkes (Terence Seward), a playboy, & Mrs Aston (Marsha Fitzalan), wife of a Whitehall official, are threatened by the Drew Brothers (Ernie Drew by Bernard Kay).

programme.title: Captain Scarlet and the Mysterons
programme.desc: Noose of Ice. 1968. Stars Jeremy Wilkin, Lian-Shin Yang & Ed Bishop. A Mysteron agent cuts the power to vital heating elements which threatens the mining operations at Hotspot Tower.

programme.title: Captain Kidd
programme.desc: 1945. Adventure. Directed by Rowland V. Lee. Stars Charles Laughton, Randolph Scott & Barbara Britton. Pirate, Captain William Kidd, tricks the king to hire him as an escort to a treasure ship. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Out of a Bomb-Site
programme.desc: 1962. An intriguing look at cycle speedway. A game born on improvised tracks amid the rubble of the air raids, more than 20 years later, has become a thriving amateur sport.

programme.title: The Ship That Died of Shame
programme.desc: (AKA PT Raiders) 1955. Thriller. Director Basil Dearden. Stars Richard Attenborough, George Baker and Bill Owen. A trio of ex-servicemen begin smuggling black market items into post-war Britain. [S]

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: Murder in Montmartre. 1960. Stars Rupert Davies, Freda Jackson & Aubrey Woods. Maigret investigates the murder of a stripper, finding himself mixing with the low life types of Montmartre. [S]

programme.title: A Family At War
programme.desc: 1971. The 48 Hour Pass. Stars Colin Douglas & Shelagh Fraser. David returns on leave with Margaret's illegitimate child expected. Shelia and David grow further apart. (S2, E05) [S]

programme.title: The Key

programme.title: The Magic Sword
programme.desc: 1962. Adventure. Directed by Bert I. Gordon. Stars Basil Rathbone, Estelle Winwood & Gary Lockwood. Sir George, a young knight, sets out to rescue the woman he loves from the evil wizard Lodac. [S]
